subject: Stanley Cup
Track and Field
Soccer
Olympic Games (2012)
lead_paragraph: The day in sports included the third stage of the Tour of Spain and the arrival in Garden River, Ontario, of the Stanley Cup, which is on its traditional off-season tour.
snippet: The day in sports included the third stage of the Tour of Spain and the arrival in Garden River, Ontario, of the Stanley Cup, which is on its traditional off-season tour.
